Divine Beloved.quote: "I am my beloved's and my beloved is mine." (Song of Solomon 6:3)

Mystical Union.quote: "The soul has been united with God like a bride with her bridegroom." (St. John of the Cross, Spiritual Canticle)

Sacred Marriage.quote: "As bridegroom to bride, so God rejoices over you." (Isaiah 62:5)

Divine Longing.quote: "As the deer pants for streams of water, so my soul pants for you, O God." (Psalm 42:1)

Spiritual Intimacy.quote: "Those who love Me will be loved by My Father." (John 14:21)

Divine Courtship.quote: "I will allure her and lead her into the wilderness and speak tenderly to her." (Hosea 2:14)

Sacred Passion.quote: "Set me as a seal upon your heart, for love is as strong as death." (Song of Solomon 8:6)

Divine Embrace.quote: "His left arm is under my head, and his right arm embraces me." (Song of Solomon 2:6)

Mystical Love.quote: "The soul in union with God flows with the divine milk." (Rumi)

Sacred Unity.quote: "The lover and the Beloved are one." (Ibn Arabi)

Divine Yearning.quote: "My heart has no peace without You." (Mirabai)

Spiritual Marriage.quote: "The marriage of the soul to Christ." (Teresa of Avila, Interior Castle)

Divine Attraction.quote: "Draw me after you and let us run together." (Song of Solomon 1:4)

Sacred Connection.quote: "Neither death nor life can separate us from the love of God." (Romans 8:38)

Divine Dance.quote: "In your light we see light itself." (Psalm 36:9)

Mystical Rapture.quote: "Drowned in the ocean of divine love." (Ramakrishna)

Sacred Heart.quote: "God has poured out his love into our hearts." (Romans 5:5)

Divine Devotion.quote: "My beloved is radiant and beautiful." (Song of Solomon 5:10)

Divine Union.quote: "Two hearts beating as one in divine harmony." (Kabir)

Sacred Bliss.quote: "In His presence is fullness of joy." (Psalm 16:11)

Divine Consummation.quote: "The soul has found its eternal resting place." (Catherine of Siena)

Mystical Marriage.quote: "The bridegroom has come for his bride." (Matthew 25:6)

Sacred Love.quote: "Love is the bridge between you and everything." (Rumi)

Divine Communion.quote: "Deep calls to deep in the roar of your waterfalls." (Psalm 42:7)

Initial Awakening.quote: "Awake, O sleeper, and arise from the dead, and Christ will shine on you." (Ephesians 5:14)

Divine Call.quote: "My beloved speaks and says to me: 'Arise, my love, my beautiful one, and come away.'" (Song of Solomon 2:10)

First Stirring.quote: "Draw me after you; let us run." (Song of Solomon 1:4)

Sacred Recognition.quote: "I have found the one whom my soul loves." (Song of Solomon 3:4)

Initial Longing.quote: "As the deer pants for streams of water, so my soul pants for you, O God." (Psalm 42:1)

Divine Attraction.quote: "With loving kindness I have drawn you." (Jeremiah 31:3)

Spiritual Pursuit.quote: "I sought him whom my soul loves; I sought him but found him not." (Song of Solomon 3:1)

Sacred Courtship.quote: "I will allure her and bring her into the wilderness and speak tenderly to her." (Hosea 2:14)

Divine Wooing.quote: "Your love is better than wine." (Song of Solomon 1:2)

First Separation.quote: "My beloved had turned and gone... I sought him, but found him not." (Song of Solomon 5:6)

Divine Testing.quote: "You have tested my heart; you have visited me by night." (Psalm 17:3)

Sacred Purification.quote: "I am black but lovely, O daughters of Jerusalem." (Song of Solomon 1:5)

Spiritual Surrender.quote: "I sleep, but my heart waketh." (Song of Solomon 5:2)

Sacred Betrothal.quote: "I will betroth you to me forever." (Hosea 2:19)

Divine Intimacy.quote: "The secret of the Lord is with them that fear him." (Psalm 25:14)

Sacred Consummation.quote: "My beloved is mine, and I am his." (Song of Solomon 2:16)

Divine Union.quote: "He who is joined to the Lord becomes one spirit with him." (1 Corinthians 6:17)

Spiritual Transformation.quote: "Changed into his likeness from one degree of glory to another." (2 Corinthians 3:18)

Divine Absorption.quote: "That they may all be one, just as you, Father, are in me, and I in you." (John 17:21)

Sacred Service.quote: "I am my beloved's and his desire is for me." (Song of Solomon 7:10)

Eternal Partnership.quote: "Neither death nor life... will be able to separate us from the love of God." (Romans 8:38-39)

Complete Fulfillment.quote: "In your presence there is fullness of joy." (Psalm 16:11)

Divine Perfection.quote: "When the perfect comes, the partial will pass away." (1 Corinthians 13:10)

Sacred Unity.quote: "I in them and you in me, that they may become perfectly one." (John 17:23)

Eternal Romance.quote: "I have loved you with an everlasting love." (Jeremiah 31:3)

Divine Ecstasy.quote: "You will fill me with joy in your presence." (Acts 2:28)

Ultimate Union.quote: "Now we see in a mirror dimly, but then face to face." (1 Corinthians 13:12)
